message.content:
{"id": "23935", 
 "title": "Bug 23935: Text widget with Tree parent does not lose focus", 
 "description": "Both widgets are children of the shell. The right tree and text only work on Windows. We can probably work around by creating the text editor as a sibling of the tree and moving it above the tree.", 
 "OB": "When running the attached code, the text widget with Tree parent does not lose focus.", 
 "EB": "When running the attached code in build 20020920, the left tree and text behave as they should on Windows and Linux.", 
 "SR": "Create a workaround by creating the text editor as a sibling of the tree and moving it above the tree to ensure the text widget with Tree parent loses focus properly."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '23935', 'title': 'Bug 23935Text widget with Tree parent does not lose focus', 'description': 'Both widgets are children ofthe shell.The right tree and text only work on Windows. We can probably work around by creating thetext editor as a sibling of the tree and moving it above the tree. ', 'OB': '', 'EB': 'build 20020920Run the attached code.The left tree and text behave as they should on Windows and Linux. ', 'SR': ''}
